txt.en: Spiders are among the most vicious, cruel, and evil of all the creatures of Middle-earth. Countless lairs have been spun in the dark of Khazad-d√ªm, blotting out what little light remains in those desolate places.

The bloated descendants of Ungoliant's children have crept forth from the dark places of the earth, seeking ever greater darkness and to darken that which is light. Moria lured them with its long shadows and forgotten halls, and they feast on any sorry creature that loses its way.
